# GDAL Utility Functions

Functions for working with geospatial data using GDAL/OGR capabilities.

## Core GDAL Tools

- [gdaltranslate](gdalfuns/gdaltranslate.html) - Convert raster data between different formats
- [gdalwarp](gdalfuns/gdalwarp.html) - Image reprojection and warping
- [gdaldem](gdalfuns/gdaldem.html) - Tools to analyze and visualize DEMs
- [ogr2ogr](gdalfuns/ogr2ogr.html) - Convert vector data between file formats

## Geometric Operations

- [arccircle](gdalfuns/arccircle.html) - Create circular arcs
- [arcellipse](gdalfuns/arcellipse.html) - Create elliptical arcs
- [boundary](gdalfuns/boundary.html) - Compute geometry boundary
- [buffer](gdalfuns/buffer.html) - Create buffer around geometry
- [buffergeo](gdalfuns/buffergeo.html) - Geographic buffer operations
- [centroid](gdalfuns/centroid.html) - Compute centroid of geometry
- [circgeo](gdalfuns/circgeo.html) - Geographic circles
- [concavehull](gdalfuns/concavehull.html) - Compute concave hull
- [convexhull](gdalfuns/convexhull.html) - Compute convex hull
- [delaunay](gdalfuns/delaunay.html) - Delaunay triangulation
- [envelope](gdalfuns/envelope.html) - Compute bounding envelope
- [envelope3d](gdalfuns/envelope3d.html) - Compute 3D bounding envelope
- [polygonize](gdalfuns/polygonize.html) - Convert raster to polygons
- [polyunion](gdalfuns/polyunion.html) - Union of polygons
- [simplify](gdalfuns/simplify.html) - Simplify geometry

## Spatial Relationships

- [contains](gdalfuns/contains.html) - Test if geometry contains another
- [crosses](gdalfuns/crosses.html) - Test if geometries cross
- [disjoint](gdalfuns/disjoint.html) - Test if geometries are disjoint
- [equals](gdalfuns/equals.html) - Test if geometries are equal
- [intersects](gdalfuns/intersects.html) - Test if geometries intersect
- [overlaps](gdalfuns/overlaps.html) - Test if geometries overlap
- [touches](gdalfuns/touches.html) - Test if geometries touch
- [within](gdalfuns/within.html) - Test if geometry is within another

## Distance & Area Calculations

- [distance](gdalfuns/distance.html) - Compute distance between geometries
- [geodesicarea](gdalfuns/geodesicarea.html) - Compute geodesic area
- [geomarea](gdalfuns/geomarea.html) - Compute geometry area
- [geomlength](gdalfuns/geomlength.html) - Compute geometry length

## Geodetic Operations

- [geod](gdalfuns/geod.html) - Geodesic calculations
- [geodesic](gdalfuns/geodesic.html) - Geodesic line operations
- [invgeod](gdalfuns/invgeod.html) - Inverse geodesic calculations
- [loxodrome](gdalfuns/loxodrome.html) - Loxodrome (rhumb line) calculations
- [loxodrome_direct](gdalfuns/loxodrome_direct.html) - Direct loxodrome problem
- [loxodrome_inverse](gdalfuns/loxodrome_inverse.html) - Inverse loxodrome problem

## Projection & Coordinate Functions

- [epsg2proj](gdalfuns/epsg2proj.html) - Convert EPSG code to PROJ string
- [epsg2wkt](gdalfuns/epsg2wkt.html) - Convert EPSG code to WKT
- [lonlat2xy](gdalfuns/lonlat2xy.html) - Convert lon/lat to projected coordinates
- [proj2wkt](gdalfuns/proj2wkt.html) - Convert PROJ string to WKT
- [setproj!](gdalfuns/setproj.html) - Set projection for data
- [wkt2proj](gdalfuns/wkt2proj.html) - Convert WKT to PROJ string
- [xy2lonlat](gdalfuns/xy2lonlat.html) - Convert projected coordinates to lon/lat

## Set Operations

- [difference](gdalfuns/difference.html) - Compute difference of geometries
- [intersection](gdalfuns/intersection.html) - Compute intersection of geometries
- [symdifference](gdalfuns/symdifference.html) - Compute symmetric difference

## Data Processing

- [dither](gdalfuns/dither.html) - Apply dithering to image
- [fillnodata](gdalfuns/fillnodata.html) - Fill nodata values in raster

## GMT Integration

- [gd2gmt](gdalfuns/gd2gmt.html) - Convert GDAL dataset to GMT object
- [gdalshade](gdalfuns/gdalshade.html) - Create shaded relief
- [gdalread](gdalfuns/gdalread.html) - Read geospatial data with GDAL
- [gdalwrite](gdalfuns/gdalwrite.html) - Write geospatial data with GDAL
- [gmt2gd](gdalfuns/gmt2gd.html) - Convert GMT object to GDAL dataset

## Miscellaneous

- [pointalongline](gdalfuns/pointalongline.html) - Get point at distance along line
